reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: West Africa Task Force - Fisheries Intelligence and MCS Support in West Africa

description.narrative: Ensure that the environment and the natural resources upon which human lives and livelihoods depend are managed in ways that sustain productivity growth, a healthy population, as well as the intrinsic spiritual and cultural value of the environment.

This award strives to ensure that the environment and the natural resources upon which human lives and livelihoods depend are managed in ways that sustain productivity growth, a healthy population, as well as the intrinsic spiritual and cultural value of the environment. More specifically, this award includes The West Africa Task Force supports improved compliance by industrial fishing operations. It is within this sector that the majority of both impacts and losses due to illegal activities in the region occurs. This is achieved through increased communication and cooperation on a national (multi-agency) and regional level; capacity building, including through provision of training, practical tools, legal and technical support; and provision of intelligence and analysis to support detection and prosecution of illegal fishing. The United States is an active participant in the region and supports efforts to improve MCS and combat illegal, unreported, and unregulated fishing activities..
